content: Ladies, gentlemen, and everyone smart enough to know that gender is nothing but a social construct: Your attention, please. It's Data Privacy Day, y'all. Recognized internationally, today's "holiday" is meant to raise awareness about the importance of taking measures to keep your online data safe. As such, we're celebrating by offering an exclusive sale in the Mashable Shop on lifetime subscriptions to five different password managers and Virtual Private Networks, or VPNs. (You know, those services that create private networks on public internet connections so you can stay anonymous and protected online.) And just because we're feeling extra festive, we'll let you save an additional 15% on your service of choice when you enter the coupon code DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Merry Data Privacy Day, indeed. Here's the scoop: Surf the ol' web completely undetected under the protection of VPNSecure, a VPN that doesn't maintain any logs of your browsing movements (unlike most other services of its kind). It comes equipped with a Smart DNS component so that you can bypass Hulu- and Netflix-blocking geographical restrictions, and offers servers in more than 46 countries and counting. A lifetime subscription to VPNSecure (worth $450) is normally $34.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to only $29.74 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Image: VPN secure Lifetime subscription to VPNSecure — $29.74 See Details Featuring powerful 256-bit encryption for your browsing on up to five devices, Ivacy VPN is a National Cyber Security Alliance-approved industry leader in internet freedom with servers in more than 50 countries worldwide. As an added bonus, each subscription comes with lifetime access to NAT Firewall, a service that blocks anonymous inbound traffic, exploits, and bad data packets so long as you're connected to Ivacy's servers. A lifetime subscription to Ivacy VPN (worth $1,254) is normally $49.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to just $42.49 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Image: ivacy Lifetime subscription to Ivacy VPN — $42.49 See Details With Password Boss Premium, you just have to remember one master password. It'll take over from there to auto-fill an unlimited number of your online accounts on up to three devices with unique usernames and strong, highly randomized passwords for top-tier security. A lifetime subscription to Password Boss Premium (worth $150) is usually $19.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to just $16.99 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Image: Password Boss Lifetime subscription to Password Boss Premium — $16.99 See Details Protect your digital information from sticky-fingered hackers with the help of Sticky Password Premium, an award-winning password manager and form-filling service. It provides complex, impenetrable passwords for all of your accounts across all of your devices and fills them in automatically; you can manage them anytime using a master code that only you know. A lifetime subscription to Sticky Password Premium (worth $149.99) is typically $39.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to only $33.99 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Image: Sticky password Lifetime subscription to Sticky Password Premium — $33.99 See Details Used by more than 45 million people worldwide, ZenMate's award-winning VPN service hides your IP address and encrypts your traffic so that no one can see what you're browsing or hack into your personal data. Once you set it up, you'll be able to access the internet safely (including geographically restricted sites and streaming services) in 30 countries around the globe. A lifetime subscription to ZenMate VPN (worth $1,099.99) is usually $89 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to just $75.65 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Image: zenguard Lifetime subscription to ZenMate VPN — $75.65 See Details Want your products featured in the Mashable Shop? Learn more about how to sell your products online !

Like Follow

5 VPNs and password managers on sale in honor of International Data Security Day

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By TEAM COMMERCEMashable Deals2019-01-28 10:00:00 UTC

Ladies, gentlemen, and everyone smart enough to know that gender is nothing but a social construct: Your attention, please.

It's Data Privacy Day, y'all.

Recognized internationally, today's "holiday" is meant to raise awareness about the importance of taking measures to keep your online data safe. As such, we're celebrating by offering an exclusive sale in the Mashable Shop on lifetime subscriptions to five different password managers and Virtual Private Networks, or VPNs. (You know, those services that create private networks on public internet connections so you can stay anonymous and protected online.)

And just because we're feeling extra festive, we'll let you save an additional 15% on your service of choice when you enter the coupon code DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout. Merry Data Privacy Day, indeed.

Here's the scoop:

1. VPNSecure

Surf the ol' web completely undetected under the protection of VPNSecure, a VPN that doesn't maintain any logs of your browsing movements (unlike most other services of its kind). It comes equipped with a Smart DNS component so that you can bypass Hulu- and Netflix-blocking geographical restrictions, and offers servers in more than 46 countries and counting.

A lifetime subscription to VPNSecure (worth $450) is normally $34.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to only $29.74 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout.




Lifetime subscription to VPNSecure — $29.74
See Details

2. Ivacy VPN

Featuring powerful 256-bit encryption for your browsing on up to five devices, Ivacy VPN is a National Cyber Security Alliance-approved industry leader in internet freedom with servers in more than 50 countries worldwide. As an added bonus, each subscription comes with lifetime access to NAT Firewall, a service that blocks anonymous inbound traffic, exploits, and bad data packets so long as you're connected to Ivacy's servers.

A lifetime subscription to Ivacy VPN (worth $1,254) is normally $49.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to just $42.49 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout.




Lifetime subscription to Ivacy VPN — $42.49
See Details

3. Password Boss Premium

With Password Boss Premium, you just have to remember one master password. It'll take over from there to auto-fill an unlimited number of your online accounts on up to three devices with unique usernames and strong, highly randomized passwords for top-tier security.

A lifetime subscription to Password Boss Premium (worth $150) is usually $19.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to just $16.99 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout.




Lifetime subscription to Password Boss Premium — $16.99
See Details

4. Sticky Password Premium

Protect your digital information from sticky-fingered hackers with the help of Sticky Password Premium, an award-winning password manager and form-filling service. It provides complex, impenetrable passwords for all of your accounts across all of your devices and fills them in automatically; you can manage them anytime using a master code that only you know.

A lifetime subscription to Sticky Password Premium (worth $149.99) is typically $39.99 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to only $33.99 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout.




Lifetime subscription to Sticky Password Premium — $33.99
See Details

5. ZenMate VPN

Used by more than 45 million people worldwide, ZenMate's award-winning VPN service hides your IP address and encrypts your traffic so that no one can see what you're browsing or hack into your personal data. Once you set it up, you'll be able to access the internet safely (including geographically restricted sites and streaming services) in 30 countries around the globe.

A lifetime subscription to ZenMate VPN (worth $1,099.99) is usually $89 in our shop, but you can save 15% and lower that price even further to just $75.65 when you enter DATAPRIVACY15 at checkout.




Lifetime subscription to ZenMate VPN — $75.65
See Details

Want your products featured in the Mashable Shop? Learn more about how to sell your products online!

Topics: data security, Mashable Deals, password manager, Tech, VPN (Virtual Private Networks)

Heads up: All products featured here are selected by Mashable's commerce team and meet our rigorous standards for awesomeness. If you buy something, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission.
